original_text: For just as the Father raises the dead and gives them life, even so the Son gives life to whom he is pleased to give it.
korean_text: 아버지께서 죽은 자들을 일으켜 살리심 같이 아들도 자기가 원하는 자들을 살리느니라

sentences.original_text: For just as the Father raises the dead
sentences.korean_translation: 아버지께서 죽은 자를 살리시는 것과 같이

sentences.original_text: even so the Son gives life
